title: ISC Acquires Leading Travel Insurance Marketplace, TravelInsurance.com | Associated Press and other syndication news | enidnews.com
author: Business Wire
content: CARLSBAD, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Apr 10, 2025-- , a leading, multi-line program administrator that builds end-to-end insurance products utilizing advanced artificial intelligence (AI) engineering, data analytics, and predictive modeling, backed by global investment firm KKR, is proud to announce the acquisition of , one of the largest independent travel insurance marketplaces in the United States. kAm%9:D 24BF:D:E:@?
